body:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
This explains how to use this source code , how to start playing and others...
any problems with this files, send an email to Younes CHEIKH
<contact@cyounes.com>.
----------------------------------------------------------------------

OBTAINING Python

  You can download python from http://python.org/getit/
  For more informations about Turtle visit http://docs.python.org/library/turtle.html

This program works perfectly in linux (All distributions), also tested on mac os x (10.7.*) and windows 7

To start playing, run 'python marienbad.py'

for more screenshots visit: http://cyounes.com/projects/marienbad-game

----------------------------
end of README.txt
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Marienbad is a mathematical game of strategy in which two players take turns removing objects from distinct heaps. On each turn, a player must remove at least one object, and may remove any number of objects provided they all come from the same heap.
name: Marienbad-puzzle
